content.text: I'm a teacher and I love my students. What do you do for a living?
I'm a stay at home mom with two young children. It's a lot of work, but I love it.
I bet! I'm really good with kids, but I don't think I could handle being a stay at home mom.
It's definitely not for everyone, but I find it very rewarding.
My son is named Liam and my daughter is named Emily.
Those are both beautiful names! I'm sure they're a handful, but they sound like they're good kids.
They are! They keep me on my toes, but they make me so happy.
I'm sure they do! Are you a fan of Nightwish?
I haven't heard of them before. What kind of music do they play?
They're a symphonic metal band from Finland. They're one of my favorite bands.
I'll have to check them out! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
